title: I am a mayor
creator_credit: John Fletcher, Leon Clore and Basic Films
brief_description: Indicates the duties of a Mayor in a small town outside London. The many facets of civic administration over which the Mayor, as Chairman of the Town Council, must preside are shown, also the work of different town councillors.
creator_credit_for_label: John Fletcher, Leon Clore and Basic Films
